title: Figure, "Rat and Mouse", ca. 1950
markings: underside: Lomonosov "LFZ" mark stamped in blue
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Rat dressed in print dress and hat sits on a chair talking to smaller mouse standing next to her, who dressed in head kerchief and red skirt

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Rat and Mouse", ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. Porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-200.
